dialogueLines.line: Well, well. Look who it is.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Double D, long time no see.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: I told you not to call me that.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Whatever. You got some business with me?
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: You know, after you failed to accomplish the last task that I commissed you with, I should be cutting you apart where you stand.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: But since I'm in a rather good mood today, I'm willing to let you off under one condition.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Win against me in a singing battle.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
